summary: This is an FBI Daily News Briefing email from December 9, 2021, summarizing media coverage of the Ghislaine Maxwell trial. It reports that federal prosecutors released intimate photos of Maxwell and Jeffrey Epstein, including one aboard his private jet, which were shown to jurors during the testimony of an FBI agent.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: On trial for allegedly recruiting and grooming four girls to be abused by her and Jeffrey Epstein from 1994 to 2004. Intimate photos of her with Epstein were released by prosecutors and shown to jurors.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Described as having an intimate relationship with Maxwell. He died by suicide in his Manhattan jail cell in August 2019 while awaiting trial on federal charges.

persons.name: Kimberly Meder
persons.context: Testified in the Maxwell trial. She reviewed thousands of images recovered in a search, and the intimate photos of Maxwell and Epstein were shown to jurors during her testimony.

persons.name: Rosenberg
persons.context: Reported for Fox News on the release of photos in the Maxwell case.

persons.name: Dhanis
persons.context: Co-reported for Fox News on the release of photos in the Maxwell case.

persons.name: Chakraborty
persons.context: Reported on the story for The Washington Examiner.

persons.name: Hurley
persons.context: Reported on the story for The Independent.

connections.description: Described as having an intimate relationship. Photos released by prosecutors illustrate this relationship, and they are jointly accused of recruiting and grooming girls for abuse.
FBI Agent Meder reviewed evidence (thousands of images) related to the case against Maxwell and testified about them at trial.
FBI Agent Meder reviewed evidence (images) related to the investigation of Epstein as part of the broader case.

events.title: Prosecutors release intimate photos of Maxwell and Epstein
events.description: Manhattan federal prosecutors released a trove of photos, including a risqu√© shot of Ghislaine Maxwell rubbing Jeffrey Epstein's feet aboard his private jet.

events.title: Photos shown to jurors during FBI agent testimony
events.description: The intimate photos of Maxwell and Epstein were shown to jurors during the testimony of FBI agent Kimberly Meder.

events.title: Jeffrey Epstein's death in jail
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein hanged himself in his Manhattan jail cell while awaiting trial on serious federal charges.

events.title: Alleged period of abuse
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell is on trial for allegedly recruiting and grooming four girls to be abused by her and Jeffrey Epstein during this period.

keyFacts: Federal prosecutors released intimate photos, including one of Ghislaine Maxwell rubbing Jeffrey Epstein's feet on his private jet, during her trial.
The photos were shown to jurors during the testimony of FBI agent Kimberly Meder, who reviewed thousands of images recovered in a search.
Maxwell was on trial for allegedly recruiting and grooming four girls for abuse by her and Epstein from 1994 to 2004.
Jeffrey Epstein died by suicide in a Manhattan jail cell in August 2019 while awaiting trial.
